Now

As a Student

I am currently a Computer Engineering student in my 7th semester at the Instituto Tecnológico Superior de Cintalapa, Chiapas, México. My studies focus on software development, databases, and system design, providing me with a strong foundation in both theoretical and practical aspects of technology.

I am dedicated to deepening my understanding of programming concepts and enhancing my skills in areas such as:

  • Software development methodologies
  • Data structures and algorithms
  • Database management systems (DBMS)
  • Networking and security principles

As a Web Developer

In my role as a Web Developer, I am actively seeking opportunities to apply my knowledge in real-world projects, particularly in backend development and database management. My experience includes working with technologies such as PHP, Java, and JavaScript, and I am keen on further enhancing my skills in:

  • Backend development with PHP and Java
  • Database management using MongoDB and MySQL
  • Frontend technologies with frameworks like Webix.js
  • Version control systems such as Git

I am open to internships, freelance opportunities, and collaborative projects that will help me grow as a developer and contribute positively to the tech community.
